Numbers__12.1__Ethiopian: Sephora the wife of Moses was of Madian, which bordered upon the land of Chus or Ethiopiawhere note, that the Ethiopia here spoken of is not that of Africa but that of Arabia.
Numbers__12.3__Exceeding meek: Moses being the meekest of men, would not contend for himself; therefore, God inspired him to write here his own defenceand the Holy Spirit, whose dictate he wrote, obliged him to declare the truth, though it was so much to his own praise.
